revision.text: ==Turkish== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|tr|[jakmak]}} * {{hyphenation|tr|yak|mak}} ===Etymology 1=== From {{inh|tr|ota|یاقمق|tr=yakmak||to burn}}, from {{inh|tr|trk-pro|*jak-||to burn}}.<ref>{{R:tut-pro:SDM|*jak-|url=http://starling.rinet.ru/cgi-bin/response.cgi?single=1&basename=%2fdata%2falt%2fturcet&text_number=++13&root=config}}</ref> Cognate with {{cog|xqa||tr=yak-||to burn}}, {{cog|cv|ҫутма||to set on fire, light}}, {{cog|kk|жағу|t=to burn}}, {{cog|ky|жагуу||to burn}}, {{cog|tk|ýakmak||to burn}}, {{cog|ug|ياقماق||to kindle, light}}, {{cog|uz|yoqmoq||to burn}}, {{cog|sah|сах||to strike fire}}. ====Verb==== {{tr-verb|yakar}} # {{lb|tr|transitive}} to [[light]]; to [[ignite]]; to set fire to, set on [[fire]] # {{lb|tr|transitive}} to [[scorch]], [[sear]], [[burn]] # {{lb|tr|transitive}} to [[burn down]], [[incinerate]] # {{lb|tr|transitive}} to [[turn on]], light (electric lights) # {{lb|tr|transitive}} to [[burn]]; to [[irritate]], [[bite]], [[scathe]] =====Related terms===== * (?) {{l|tr|yanmak}} =====Derived terms===== {{der4|tr| | |yakma |yakış |yakıcı |yakıt |yakım |yakılmak |yakınmak |yaktırmak |yakmamak |yakamamak |yakabilmek |}} =====See also===== * {{l|tr|ateşe vermek}} * {{l|tr|tutuşturmak}} ===Etymology 2=== Akin to {{cog|xqa||tr=yak-||to come near, touch, smear on}}, {{cog|ug|ياقماق||to stick, adhere, smear on, apply to}}. ====Verb==== {{tr-verb|yakar}} # {{lb|tr|transitive}} to [[apply]] to, [[smear]] on =====Synonyms===== * {{l|tr|sürmek}} =====Related terms===== * {{l|tr|yakı}} ===Conjugation=== {{tr-conj|yak|ı|yakar|a|t}} ===References=== <references/>
